post_title: Looking for specific ule Lads decorations

comments.author: treehugger312
comments.body: We saw these at the Christmas store on Laugavegur. May have also been at some of the bigger Icewear stores as well.

comments.author: CharacterNo8585
comments.body:
You could try to contact the Christmas store on Laugavegur. Maybe they could help.

https://jolabudin.is

comments.body:
These are widely available downtown. 
Icewear, Viking, Islandia..
